text: goal rSpliteExcel split excel files separate excel, gather sheets form.

title: Split Excel Files by Sheets and Integrate sheets
text: can install development version rSpliteExcel GitHub :

title: Split Excel Files by Sheets and Integrate sheets
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: # library(rSpliteExcel) ## basic example code rSpliteExcel::multiplesheets(fname = "example/test.xlsx") #> [[1]] #> [1] "column1" "column2" "column3" #>  #> [[2]] #> [1] "column1" #>  #> [[3]] #> [1] "column2" #>  #> [[4]] #> [1] "column2" #>  #> [[5]] #> [1] "column1" "column2" "column3" # library(rSpliteExcel) ## basic example code # wirte sheets with same form. # rSpliteExcel::multiplesheets_write(fname = "example/test.xlsx")
